author: vmassol
msg: (forget the stupid thing I just committed !). Here is the correct thing: It seems that the latest Xalan 2 is less permissive and that all XSL parameters need to be defined before being used (so, added needed <xsl:param> defs)

author: vmassol
msg: changed $variable to @variable as it seems it is no longer supported in latest version of Xalan 2

author: vmassol
msg: Automatically add the query string parameters defined when using the ServletTestRequest.setURL() API to the list of parameters passed to the server redirector, so that it won't be necessary to call ServletTestRequest.addParameter() for each of these parameters.
